verbose_text: It has been demonstrated in our previous study that runt related transcription factor 2 (Runx2), inhibitor of differentiation (Id) 1, 2 and 3 are targets of BMP9, and are critical to BMP9 induced osteogenic differentiation in MSCs.
evidence: runt-related transcription factor 2 (Runx2), inhibitor of differentiation (Id)1, 2 and 3 are targets of BMP9, and are critical to BMP9-induced osteogenic differentiation
